product-info.opis: Oljno tekoče milo za roke s hranljivim arganovim oljem kožo očisti, ne da bi jo pri tem izsušilo, jo hkrati izdatno neguje ter spodbuja njeno obnavljanje. Nepogrešljivo za suho, razpokano kožo.- 100 % organic argan oil- antibacterial- anti-dryness- skin-friendly pH- paraben, paraffin & silicone FREE

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Niacinamide, Parfum, Citric Acid, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Octocrylene, Homosalate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Methylisothiazolinone,Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Limonene, CI 47005, CI 14720, CI 42051

contact-information.kontakt:: Kozmetika Afrodita d.o.o., Kidričeva 54, 3250 Rogaška Slatina, Slovenija
